trans-unit.source: Represents the base class for views that define the appearance of data in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representerer basisklassen for visninger som definerer utseendet til data i en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> view mode is derived from the ViewBase class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>Visningsmodus er avledet fra klassen ViewBase.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: You typically use a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> control to lay out data in columns.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis bruker en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>med den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>kontrollen til å sette opp data i kolonner.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the ViewBase class to create custom view modes for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også bruke klassen ViewBase til å opprette egendefinerte visningsmodi for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View%2A> property defines the view mode that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> control uses.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View%2A>definerer visningsmodus som den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>kontrollere bruker.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ViewBase"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ViewBase"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Removes all bindings and styling that are set for an item.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner alle bindinger og stil som er angitt for et element.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"></xref> to remove settings from.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"> </xref> til å fjerne innstillingene.

trans-unit.source: Gets the object that is associated with the style for the view mode.
trans-unit.target: Henter objektet som er knyttet til stilen for visningsmodus.

trans-unit.source: If this property is not overridden by a derived class, the style for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> control is used as the default style.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen ikke overstyres av en avledet klasse, stil for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>kontrollen brukes som standard.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: Use this property to set the style for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til å angi stilen for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The style to use for the view mode.
trans-unit.target: Stilen som skal brukes for visningsmodus.

trans-unit.source: The default value is the style for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er stilen for den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Is called when a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"></xref> control creates a <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer"></xref> for its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View*>.
trans-unit.target: Kalles når en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen oppretter en <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer"> </xref> for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer> first uses the properties and <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationPattern> objects that are implemented by the specified view, before using the default properties and patterns that are defined for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer>brukes først egenskapene og <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationPattern>objekter som implementeres av den angitte visningen før du bruker standardegenskaper og mønstre som er definert for en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationPattern> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"></xref> control to use to create the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen skal bruke til å opprette den <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.IViewAutomationPeer"></xref> interface that implements the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer"></xref> for a custom <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View*>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.IViewAutomationPeer"> </xref> grensesnitt som implementerer den <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer"> </xref> for en egendefinert <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the style to use for the items in the view mode.
trans-unit.target: Henter malen som skal brukes for elementer i visningsmodus.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to set the style for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem>.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til å angi stilen for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: The style of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Stilen på en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is the style for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er stilen for den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Prepares an item in the view for display, by setting bindings and styles.
trans-unit.target: Forbereder et element i visningen for visning, ved å angi bindinger og stiler.

trans-unit.source: The item to prepare for display.
trans-unit.target: Elementet til å klargjøre for visning.
